headline.main: Bruno Mars, Justin Timberlake Shine at iHeartRadio Awards
headline.print_headline: Bruno Mars, Justin Timberlake Shine at iHeartRadio Awards

lead_paragraph: The 2017 iHeartRadio Music Awards started with Justin Timberlake speaking about inclusion and dedicating his award to children who feel different, and ended with a rousing performance by Bruno Mars that included crowd participation from Florida Georgia Line, Thomas Rhett, Ty Dolla $ign, Heidi Klum and more.
